[VisualShaderNodeWorldPositionFromDepth](class_visualshadernodeworldpositionfromdepth.md)

Base class for [VisualShader](class_visualshader.md) nodes. Not related to scene nodes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Visual shader graphs consist of various nodes. Each node in the graph is a separate object and they are represented as a rectangular boxes with title and a set of properties. Each node also has connection ports that allow to connect it to another nodes and control the flow of the shader.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using VisualShaders](../tutorials/shaders/visual_shaders.md)

## Enumerations

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **PortType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType)

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_SCALAR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_SCALAR** = `0`

Floating-point scalar. Translated to ``float`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_SCALAR_INT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_SCALAR_INT** = `1`

Integer scalar. Translated to ``int`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_SCALAR_UINT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_SCALAR_UINT** = `2`

Unsigned integer scalar. Translated to ``uint`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_VECTOR_2D"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_VECTOR_2D** = `3`

2D vector of floating-point values. Translated to ``vec2`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_VECTOR_3D"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_VECTOR_3D** = `4`

3D vector of floating-point values. Translated to ``vec3`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_VECTOR_4D"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_VECTOR_4D** = `5`

4D vector of floating-point values. Translated to ``vec4`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_BOOLEAN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_BOOLEAN** = `6`

Boolean type. Translated to ``bool`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_TRANSFORM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_TRANSFORM** = `7`

Transform type. Translated to ``mat4`` type in shader code.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_SAMPLER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_SAMPLER** = `8`

Sampler type. Translated to reference of sampler uniform in shader code. Can only be used for input ports in non-uniform nodes.<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_constant_PORT_TYPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) **PORT_TYPE_MAX** = `9`

Represents the size of the [PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_property_linked_parent_graph_frame"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **linked_parent_graph_frame** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_property_linked_parent_graph_frame)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_frame**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_frame**\ (\ )

Represents the index of the frame this node is linked to. If set to ``-1`` the node is not linked to any frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_property_output_port_for_preview"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **output_port_for_preview** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_property_output_port_for_preview)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_output_port_for_preview**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_output_port_for_preview**\ (\ )

Sets the output port index which will be showed for preview. If set to ``-1`` no port will be open for preview.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_clear_default_input_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_default_input_values**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_clear_default_input_values)

Clears the default input ports value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_get_default_input_port"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_default_input_port**\ (\ type\: [PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_get_default_input_port)

Returns the input port which should be connected by default when this node is created as a result of dragging a connection from an existing node to the empty space on the graph.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_get_default_input_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md) **get_default_input_values**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_get_default_input_values)

Returns an [Array](class_array.md) containing default values for all of the input ports of the node in the form ``[index0, value0, index1, value1, ...]``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_get_input_port_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **get_input_port_default_value**\ (\ port\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_get_input_port_default_value)

Returns the default value of the input `port`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_remove_input_port_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_input_port_default_value**\ (\ port\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_remove_input_port_default_value)

Removes the default value of the input `port`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_set_default_input_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_default_input_values**\ (\ values\: [Array](class_array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_set_default_input_values)

Sets the default input ports values using an [Array](class_array.md) of the form ``[index0, value0, index1, value1, ...]``. For example: ``[0, Vector3(0, 0, 0), 1, Vector3(0, 0, 0)]``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNode_method_set_input_port_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_input_port_default_value**\ (\ port\: [int](class_int.md), value\: [Variant](class_variant.md), prev_value\: [Variant](class_variant.md) = null\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNode_method_set_input_port_default_value)

Sets the default `value` for the selected input `port`.
